# U

**Parameters**

-   `selector` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** , all CSS selector or '#' to identify an id tag attribute

Returns **any** on elements property a collection of node that match selector or first node that match id tag attribute (#)

## addClass

**Parameters**

-   `className` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** , name of class to set on elements that match selector

## removeClass

**Parameters**

-   `className` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** , name of class to remove on elements that match selector

## attr

/ get and set

**Parameters**

-   `name` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** , name of attribute to set on elements that match selector
-   `value` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** , value of attribute to set on elements that match selector

## removeAttr

**Parameters**

-   `name` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** , name of attribute to remove on elements that match selector

## on

**Parameters**

-   `event` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** , event to bind on elements that match selector
-   `Function` **[function](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/function)** , function to be done on event occur

## create

create a new tag and append it on elements that match selector

**Parameters**

-   `setter` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** , object that describe new tag that function return
    -   `setter.tag` **[string](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String)** , name of tag ex. 'div, text, input, span, etc'
    -   `setter.attribute` **([Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object) \| [Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array)&lt;[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)>)** , object {attr:'name of attribute', value:'value of attribute'} or array of that object to set on new tag

## css

set css rule on elements that match selector

**Parameters**

-   `setter` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** , object {"css rule": "css value"} ex.{border: "1px solid red', position:'relative'}
